about_the_game:
The Retro Cosmetic Pack includes the following content, for use in Borderlands 3:

  • Retro Vault Hunter head
  • Retro Vault Hunter skin
  • Retro Echo Device skin
  • Retro weapon skin

This content is included in the Borderlands 3 Deluxe Edition and Super Deluxe Edition.
